entities.name: woman
entities.description: The woman who sold Harry and Ron food at the station. She is described as having a lot of strange things to sell.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story, who buys food from the woman at the station.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Another one of the main characters in the story, who also buys food from the woman at the station.

entities.name: bertie bott's every-flavour beans
entities.description: A type of candy that the woman sells to Harry and Ron.

relationships.description: Harry bought food from the woman at the station.
Ron also bought food from the woman at the station.
Harry ate a pumpkin pasty that he bought from the woman.
